scripts.dev:reveal-watch: concurrently -k -n REVEAL -c magenta "nodemon --watch slides --ext md --ignore slides/tmp-*.md --exec 'npm run build:reveal'"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n DOCS,REVEAL -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev:docusaurus" "npm run dev:reveal-watch"
scripts.build: npm run build:reveal && npm run build:docusaurus
